content.en: Enhancing voice detection: Researchers have been investigating various ways to improve voice activity detection in noisy environments. They have explored the use of algorithms designed for low signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) environments, multiple observation likelihood ratio tests, generalized likelihood ratio tests, and integrated bispectrum likelihood ratio tests, among others. These algorithms aim to enhance speech detection robustness and speech recognition performance, as well as improve voice activity detection against background noise and in non-stationary noise conditions. The goal is to develop more accurate and reliable voice activity detection algorithms that can be used in various noisy environments.
content.da: Forbedring af stemmedetektion: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige måder at forbedre stemmeaktivitetdetektion i støjfyldte omgivelser. De har udforsket brugen af algoritmer designet til miljøer med lav signal-støj ratio (SNR), multiple observations-likelihood-forholdstest, generaliserede likelihood-forholdstest og integrerede bispektrum-likelihood-forholdstest, blandt andre. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre robustheden af talegenkendelse og ydeevnen af stemmeaktivitetdetektion, samt at forbedre stemmeaktivitetdetektion mod baggrundsstøj og i ikke-stationære støjforhold. Målet er at udvikle mere præcise og pålidelige stemmeaktivitetdetektionsalgoritmer, der kan anvendes i forskellige støjfyldte miljøer.
